snippet: With little time in between playoff series, Joe Girardi opted to try Alex Rodriguez in the No. 6 spot in Game 1 and use Hiroki Kuroda on short rest for the first time in his career.
lead_paragraph: With little time in between playoff series, Joe Girardi opted to try Alex Rodriguez in the No. 6 spot in Game 1 and use Hiroki Kuroda on short rest for the first time in his career.

headline.seo: Rodriguez Returns to Yankees’ Lineup; Kuroda Will Start Game 2 vs. Tigers
headline.main: Rodriguez Returns to Lineup, but in the Sixth Spot; Kuroda Will Start Game 2
headline.print_headline: Rodriguez Returns to Lineup, but in the Sixth Spot; Kuroda Will Start Game 2
